Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.SceneFactories

Class GameScreen

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.SceneFactories.SceneHandler
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.SceneFactories.GameScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneFactory
public class GameScreen extends SceneHandler implements SceneFactory
Scene Factory for game creation and management of game interface, calls and updates.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(boolean fromserver)
      Method to disconnect this client from the server, if fromserver parameter is false this client will send a QuitMessage to the server, signalling its will to cease all connection. This method is either called from ViewInterface implementation on GraphicalUI or as a server consequence of a message from a server signalling the closure of the lobby
      Parameters:
      fromserver - true if this call comes from the server, false if it's called from JavaFx controls
